content.raw: Creating constructor and destructor seems reasonable to me because it allows the private data structure holder to be free from the responsibility of initializing and destructing the variables in the private data structure. I added them in [fe4ac90](https://bitbucket.org/jlee02/gazebo_dart/commits/fe4ac902d035d37f3f3de317bb0e15562a4f70df).
content.html: Creating constructor and destructor seems reasonable to me because it allows the private data structure holder to be free from the responsibility of initializing and destructing the variables in the private data structure. I added them in fe4ac90.

content.raw: It's retargeted to `gazebo6` branch.
content.html: It's retargeted to gazebo6 branch.

content.raw:
I found two ways in Gazebo: (1) [making friends](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/82b3f2539fe8027b36dc6b32b12ed586da2dd8c1/gazebo/physics/World.hh?at=default#cl-481) and (2) using protected data pointer. 

As a node: `Visual` has pointer to `VisualPrivate`, and `[~]Visual` classes use `[~]VisualPrivate` that inherit `VisualPrivate`. For example, `InertiaVisualPrivate` inherits `VisualPrivate`, and `VisualPrivate`. `[~]Visual` classes always cast the data pointer to corresponding type before it's used. But `DART[~]Joint` classes just use `DARTJointPrivate`, which contains `dart::dynamics::Joint` pointer, and cast `dart::dynamics::Joint` pointer to corresponding pointer type.

Please let me know which way is preferred. I'll follow it.
content.html:
I found two ways in Gazebo: (1) making friends and (2) using protected data pointer.

As a node: Visual has pointer to VisualPrivate, and [~]Visual classes use [~]VisualPrivate that inherit VisualPrivate. For example, InertiaVisualPrivate inherits VisualPrivate, and VisualPrivate. [~]Visual classes always cast the data pointer to corresponding type before it's used. But DART[~]Joint classes just use DARTJointPrivate, which contains dart::dynamics::Joint pointer, and cast dart::dynamics::Joint pointer to corresponding pointer type.

Please let me know which way is preferred. I'll follow it.

content.raw: Retarget to the `gazebo6` branch please.
content.html: Retarget to the gazebo6 branch please.
